titles.title: A bill to reliquidate certain entries of salmon.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/14/2006--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to liquidate or reliquidate, without assessment of antidumping duties or interest, specified entries of salmon at the port of Miami, Florida. Requires refund of any antidumping duties or interest previously paid on such entries.
